_header: True love is a law that seemeth he had not right
Subjects: God, love of; love, nature of; sermons, verse in
_description: On God’s Love — three monorhyming lines in a Latin sermon for Corpus Christi by Lawrence Bretoun, OFM

OxfMert248.Transcription:
Trewe loue is a lawe þat semeþ he had no riȝtTrewe
                    loue is a wisdom wiþ outen insiȝtTrewe loue is a rowour &
                    doþ noman vnriȝt
OxfMert248.Editions:
Pfander,  Homer Garrison. 
             “The Popular Sermon of the Medieval Friar in England.” 
         Diss. New York University, 1937: 50.

CULIi38.Transcription: Loue ys a lawe þat schinit wiþoute rist
